alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Shelby County through 430 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shelby County Airport, or near Alabaster, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Calera, Montevallo, Columbiana, American Village, University Of Montevallo, Maylene, Shelby County Airport, Shelby, Ballantrae, Camp Branch, Saddle Lake Farms, Siluria, Alabaster Veterans Park, Bounds Lake and Saginaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
